Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: mdblevins1
Reviews.Content: This is my third scepter, one in the living room, one in the bedroom and this one I bought for my little man cave.  Keep in mind, this is 5 stars because of quality vs. price.  You can find much better in Samsung and LG however, this is not a 2 grand tv.  The colors are good, sometimes on the warm side which I prefer, but the TV is solid.  Refresh rate is great and no ghosting when playing games on my PS3.  Light and sturdy built of quality materials.  Will buy again no doubt.

Reviews.Title: great cheap and light tv
Reviews.Author: Aaron "aaronw_234"
Reviews.Content: Worked right out of the box, good picture quality, super light weight. Enough HDMI ports and other things. The supplied bottom stand is a bit cheap feeling, but works nicely and even swivels

Reviews.Title: got this one on almost half off
Reviews.Author: V. Arpiarian "Vonsky"
Reviews.Content: worked great right out of the box - no problems, awesome price too ! where's else bu on Amazon can you find such deals !The only minus : Ethernet connection not available wired or wireless
